name: The millenial bunker
description:
A game where a boomer is trapped with a bunch of millenials at the end of the world.

Satisfy these brats' needs while taking care of your own. Survive and hold them inside for as long as you can.

This game has been made for the Weekly Game Jam #152 with theme "Shelter".

Mouse click to select stuff at the beggining. Your character moves with ASDW.

All art and sound/music credits go to Raül Fornell  https://www.behance.net/raulfornell

All other programming and game design stuff made by myself.
